item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Err. Do you mean something like…

if (command.startsWith("commands")) { sendQuest("Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::command", 8145); sendQuest("::pure", 8147); sendQuest("::master (If Admin)", 8148); sendQuest("::staffzone (If Mod+)", 8149); sendQuest("::home", 8150); sendQuest("::train - NO PKING THERE. If you do, you will be banned.", 8151); sendQuest("::skillhelp", 8152); sendQuest("::suggest - Suggest something to Owner.", 8156); sendQuest("::mypk", 8157); sendQuest("::mystats or ::stats", 8158); sendQuest("Find the other secrets of the server on your own. :)", 8159); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
(You CAN change what it says… Just change the sendQuest("..."), ####); - …
To make it look like…

2l50zp.jpg769×549

If not, be more specific.
(That pic was from my custom PC. I just added in monsters, agression, portal resistance, and monster walkability.)
